oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ökonomische Analyse des Biosiegels
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Herrmann, Roland
Henseleit, Meike
Anders, Sven
Thompson, Stanley
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Policy environments and social economy
Markets and trade
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In our study we are planning to analyse panel data econometrically in order to elabo-rate determinants of the demand for organic products. The aim of this survey is to investigate demand elasticities for eco-labelled products. By means of these elastic-ities, we will derive the impact of the “Biosiegel” on prices, quantities, expenditures and welfare. Finally, we expect conclusions from our evaluation about the efficiency of merchandising organic foods by advertising the ecolabel.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Herrmann, Roland; Henseleit, Meike; Anders, Sven and Thompson, Stanley (2007) Ökonomische Analyse des Biosiegels. [Economic analysis of the ecolabel “Biosiegel”.] Poster at: Zwischen Tradition und Globalisierung - 9. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, Universität Hohenheim, Stuttgart, Deutschland, 20.-23.03.2007.
